statements: SELECT * FROM TravelItinerary ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, destination FROM TravelItinerary WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TravelItinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT customer_name, travel_dates FROM TravelItinerary WHERE travel_dates BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT destination FROM TravelItinerary ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT * FROM TravelItinerary WHERE destination = 'Paris' AND customer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY travel_dates DESC, itinerary_id ASC
SELECT customer_name, destination, travel_dates FROM TravelItinerary WHERE interests LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT itinerary_id, customer_name, destination FROM TravelItinerary WHERE travel_dates BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY destination, customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, interests FROM TravelItinerary WHERE interests IS NOT NULL ORDER BY LENGTH(interests) DESC, customer_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_itineraries, AVG(itinerary_id) AS average_id FROM TravelItinerary WHERE special_requests IS NULL
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, destination, budget FROM customer_preferences WHERE budget >= 1000;
SELECT destination, customer_id FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT * FROM special_requests WHERE request_status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_id, request_description FROM special_requests WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT destination, budget FROM customer_preferences WHERE budget >= 500.00 ORDER BY destination DESC;
SELECT customer_id, destination, travel_dates FROM customer_preferences WHERE travel_dates BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-08-31' ORDER BY travel_dates;
SELECT customer_id, request_description, request_status FROM special_requests WHERE request_status = 'pending' ORDER BY request_id DESC;

SELECT customer_id, destination, budget, travel_dates FROM customer_preferences JOIN special_requests ON customer_preferences.customer_id = special_requests.customer_id ORDER BY destination, request_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT destination, travel_dates FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, interest_type, activity_level FROM CustomerInterests WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, special_request FROM SpecialRequests WHERE request_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, destination, budget FROM CustomerPreferences ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerPreferences;
SELECT destination, travel_dates FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE budget > 2000;
SELECT customer_id, interest_type, activity_level FROM CustomerInterests JOIN CustomerPreferences ON CustomerInterests.customer_id = CustomerPreferences.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, destination AS 'Preferred Destination', budget AS 'Max Budget' FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT request_id, special_request FROM SpecialRequests WHERE customer_id = (SELECT customer_id FROM CustomerPreferences WHERE destination = 'Paris');
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT destination_name, destination_rating FROM destinations ORDER BY destination_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE travel_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, destination_name, itinerary_cost FROM customers c JOIN itineraries i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT destination_name, destination_description, destination_image_url FROM destinations WHERE destination_rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_name, destination_name, travel_date FROM customers c JOIN preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT c.customer_name, d.destination_name, i.itinerary_cost FROM customers c JOIN itineraries i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN destinations d ON i.destination_id = d.destination_id WHERE i.itinerary_cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Travelers;
SELECT traveler_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Travelers;
SELECT traveler_id, first_name, phone_number FROM Travelers ORDER BY traveler_id ASC;
SELECT destination_name, country, city, description FROM Destinations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT activity_name, duration_hours, cost FROM Activities WHERE cost < 100 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM Travelers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Travelers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT traveler_id, first_name, city FROM Travelers JOIN Destinations ON Travelers.traveler_id = Destinations.destination_id;
SELECT * FROM Destinations WHERE country = 'Italy';
SELECT traveler_id, destination_name, start_date FROM Itineraries WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
